DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , non-randomized study 50 people suspect biliary dyskinesia . The purpose study investigate possible use ultrasound make diagnosis condition call biliary dyskinesia . The investigator null hypothesis statistical difference propose experimental test ( Ultrasound ) HIDA scan ( nuclear medicine hepatobiliary system scan ) diagnosis biliary dyskinesia .
DOC.criteria: 1 . All subject suspect clinical diagnosis biliary dyskinesia , include ultrasound demonstrates biliary wall thickness < 3 mm , gallstone present . 2 . Written inform consent document . 3 . Males Females age > 18 year 1 . Subjects without suspected clinical diagnosis biliary dyskinesia , include ultrasound demonstrates biliary wall thickness > 3 mm , and/or gallstone present . 2 . Pregnant breastfeed woman 3 . Subjects consent take part study .
